saved_profiles.title: Saved Profiles
saved_profiles.tooltip:
This option allows you to automatically save profiles for the servers you have previously joined.
So the next time you want to host or join a certain server with the same set of mods you will not have to wait for the mods to apply.
Warning! As it is copying a whole set of mods in a certain order, it can take a lot of space on your hard drive.
Ensure yourself you have enough of it.

walk_through.title: Setup
walk_through.bugs_notice: Please note that the mod manager is still in beta and bugs may occur. If you encounter a bug, please post it in #bugs on the Discord server.

select_frosty_path.description: In order for the Mod Manager to work properly, you need to first select your Frosty Folder. If you are using an unsupported Frosty version, the Mod Manager might stop working.
select_frosty_path.notice_text: Please select your Frosty folder where the FrostyModManager.exe is located. This is necessary for that mod detection and the mod downloading.
select_frosty_path.important_text: Please make sure, that Frosty has already detected Star Wars Battlefront II otherwise the Mod Manager will not work properly.

error_messages.bf2_not_found: Frosty has not detected Star Wars Battlefront II.

nexus_mods_login.title: NexusMods Login

notifications.invalid_code: Invalid two factor code. Please try again.

nexus_mods_login.text_0: To continue, you will need to log in with your NexusMods account in the browser that is about to open.
nexus_mods_login.text_1: Please note that if you want to have automatic mod downloading you have to log in with your Nexusmods account.
nexus_mods_login.text_2:
The data is processed locally and will only be sent to Nexusmods.
You can also enable/disable this feature later in the settings menu.

required_mods.not_in_database: Some mods are not in the Moddatabase!
required_mods.click_on_download: Click on the download button below.
required_mods.required_mods: You haven't installed the required mods to join this server.

download_page.unsupported_mods_2: You can submit mods in the Discord channel #mod-submissions.
download_page.unsupported_mods_3: Currently only a selected list of mods can be downloaded automatically.

failed_injection.title: Failed to inject Kyber
failed_injection.text: To fix this you can do the following:
failed_injection.text_1: Restart Kyber Mod Manager with administrator rights.
failed_injection.text_2: Add '%appdata%/Kyber Mod Manager/Kyber.dll' as a exception to your antivirus.

cosmetic_mods.warning: If the server is using many mods (especially ones that change appearances), applying this option may cause your game to not work properly.

joining_states.battlefront: Waiting for Battlefront II to start...
joining_states.battlefront_2: If Battlefront II doesn't start automatically, start it manually.

host_server.title: Host Server
host_server.server_updated: Updated! To apply the changes, press ESC in Battlefront 2 and then hit restart.

hosting_dialog.title: Hosting
hosting_dialog.wait_for_bf2: Waiting for Battlefront II to start...
hosting_dialog.wait_for_server: Waiting for the server to start...

name.error: The server name can't be empty.

mod_profile.no_profile_found: The select mod profile was not found.
mod_profile.tooltip:
Choose the mod profile you want to use for this server.
If you do not choose anything, your last used profile will be applied.
To host Kyber server without any mods, please select No Mods.

max_players.tooltip:
Choose the desired number of players your server will be for.
Remember: Fast internet connection is required to allow many players to join your server and play on it without lags.

auto_balance.tooltip: When turned on, players will not be able to choose the team they prefer - they will be put into a random team depending on a number of players currently in-game.

select_frosty_profile.title: Load Frosty profile
select_frosty_profile.label: Select a Frosty profile to import:

load_frosty_profile.title: Import Frosty profile
load_frosty_profile.tooltip: If you already have mod profiles made in the Frosty Mod Manager, you can import them to KMM with this button.

name.error: The profile name can't be empty.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: If you have any suggestions or issues, please contact us on Discord or on the GitHub page.

frosty_profile.title: Frosty Profile
frosty_profile.subtitle: Enables the Frosty Profile globally for Battlefront II. (Overwrites FrostyFix & restarts your selected platform)
frosty_profile.tooltip:
This option is an integrated FrostyFix counterpart, essential doing the same task as it. It enables mods for all platforms you have access to. 
Warning! Until you disable it, it will work even after PC restart or closing KMM app.

saved_profiles.title: Saved Profiles
saved_profiles.subtitle: Saves your applied frost profiles and restores them when needed.

nexus_mods.title: Nexus Mods
nexus_mods.subtitle: Login into your NexusMods account to enable automatic mod downloading.

discord_activity.title: Discord Activity
discord_activity.subtitle: Shows your current server activity on Discord.

change_frosty_directory.title: Relocate Frosty Path
change_frosty_directory.subtitle: Change Frosty path to a different location.
